nodes.text: Lisk were a species of bipedal predatory reptiles found on Ilum. Lisks were warm-blooded and had fibrous, hair-like scales for use as insulation and defense. They had two pairs of large eyes, each operated independently by one hemisphere of the brain. When sleeping, only half of a Lisk's body would sleep at one time.

Lisk species first appeared in the massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011.
Jungle Lisk, Swamp Lisk and Rock Lisk are minipets added to the game in 2013.
